meanings.definition: A long-handled brush used for sweeping.
meanings.sent1: She swept the floor with a broomsticks.
meanings.sent2: The witch flew on her broomsticks through the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The broomsticks danced around the room on their own!

meanings.sent5: The broomsticks stood in the corner, ready for cleaning duty.

meanings.definition: A stick or handle to which the bristles of a broom are attached.
meanings.sent1: He grabbed the broomsticks to start sweeping.
meanings.sent2: The broomsticks were worn out from years of use.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted at the broomsticks playfully.
